TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReportPrintEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.Print"> and <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.PrintingBegin> events.
Gets or sets the printer settings to use for the current operation.
Docs.remarks:
## Remarks By default, this property contains the same values as the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.PrinterSettings%2A> property in <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer>, except that its <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrintRange%2A> property is always set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintRange.AllPages> for the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.Print> event.
This property cannot be set to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
